name: 3D Winter Road Bike Racing - eXtreme Snow Mountain Downhill Race Simulator Game FREE
name_original: 3D Winter Road Bike Racing - eXtreme Snow Mountain Downhill Race Simulator Game FREE
description:
Are you ready for eXtreme Biking? Race down a snowy mountain road at top speed if you’ve got the guts. Avoid falling rocks and sharp turns. Can you master the mountain pass on your road bike? Not for the faint of heart.

Features:
-Falling rock hazards
-Awesome 3D environment
-Realistic Physics
